item.description: Daniel Alejandro Melo Nuvan # About me # Hi! I’m Daniel Alejandro Melo Nuvan, I’m a Software Engineer with 1 and a half year of experience with Backend technologies like Docker, NodeJS, Django, Mysql, MongoDb, and many other. As a thechnofile i’m always willing to learn new technologies and improve my skills in as many fields as possible, and the optimization thechniques that are required for the visual computing field are a great challenge for me.

David Alejandro Cifuentes Gonzalez # I’m a Systems engenering student at Universidad Nacional de Colombia, I’m from Bogota-Colombia and I’m currently coursing the sixth semester of the carrer My carrer development aspirations Data Science AI Project Management Hobbies Tennis Guitar/Piano Overthink stuff Music
